allowAnyUser: Allow login of all authenticatable users
allowAnyUserTooltip: A user account in Seatsurfing's internal user directory will be created on first successful login.
allowBookingNonExistUsers: Allow bookings for non-existing users (create on booking, admins only)
askApplyRecurrenceAnyway: Apply recurrence to book available time slots anyway?
bookingPending: Your booking needs to be confirmed first.
cloudFeatureHeadline: This feature is only available in the Professional Edition.
cloudFeedbackError: An error occurred while sending your feedback. Please try again later.
cloudFeedbackPrompt: What do you like, what would you want us to improve about Seatsurfing?
cloudFeedbackThanks: Thanks for sharing your feedback with us
cloudUpgradeHintHeadline: Unlock additional features and unlimited users
cloudUpgradeHintText: Upgrade to Seatsurfing Professional with just one click
confirmDeleteArea: Delete area? All spaces and bookings will be lost!
confirmDeleteAuthProvider: Delete Auth Provider? Logins using this provider will not be possible anymore!
confirmDeleteQuestion2: Are you REALLY sure? If you delete this organization, all bookings, areas, spaces and users will be deleted irretrievably. No recovery will be possible.
confirmDeleteOrgConfirmMailSent: An email with a link to finally confirm the deletion was sent to your organization's primary email address. Use the following code to confirm the deletion: {{code}}
confirmDeleteOrgError: Your organization was not deleted. Please enter the deletion code shown in the administration interface. Please also make sure the confirmation link you used is not older than one hour.
confirmRemoveBuddy: Are you sure you want to remove buddy?
confluenceAnonymous: Allow anonymous Confluence users (for demonstration purposes only)
confluenceAnonymousHint: Please log in with Confluence to use the Seatsurfing for Confluence App.
confluenceClientIdHint: Welcome to Seatsurfing! For this app to work with Confluence, we'll need to link your Confluence instance with your Seatsurfing account. Please perform the following steps:
confluenceClientIdStep2: Log in to the administrator interface.
confluenceClientIdStep5: Paste the ID as 'Confluence Client ID' and save your Settings.
customLogoUrlHint: Leave empty to use the default logo
dailyBasisBooking: Allow bookings on a daily basis only
errorSlotConflict: There is already another booking in the selected date range.
errorBookingLimit: You've reached the limit of {{num}} bookings.
errorCaldav: Error connecting to CalDAV Server. Check URL and credentials.
errorConcurrentBookingLimit: You've reached the limit of {{num}} concurrent bookings.
errorDaysAdvance: Your booking must not be more than {{num}} days in advance.
errorDeleteBooking: An error occurred while deleting your booking.
errorDeleteBookingBeforeMaxCancel: You cannot cancel a booking less than {{num}} hours before. Contact an admin.
errorDateRangeTooLong: The selected date range is too large.
errorEnterFuture: Enter date must be in the future.
errorLeaveAfterEnter: Leave date must be after enter date.
errorLeavePast: Leave date must be not be in the past
errorLogin: An error occurred while signing you in. Your email address might not be associated with an organization.
errorMaxBookingDuration: The maximum booking duration is {{num}} hours.
errorMinBookingDuration: The minimum booking duration is {{num}} hours.
errorNoAuthProviders: No authentication providers for your user.
errorSave: Error while saving, please try again later.
errorSubscriptionLimit: You've reached the maximum number of users.
errorTooManyConcurrent: Capacity limit reached in selected area.
errorTryAgain: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errorUnknown: Unknown error, please try again later.
errorValidateDomain: Error verifying domain {{domain}}: Please ensure that you've set up the DNS TXT record correctly.
errorInPast: Your booking cannot be in the past.
initPasswordResetEmail: Please check your emails to reset your password.
initPasswordResetFailed: That didn't work! Please try again later.
introIncomingMergeRequests: You have incoming account merge request. Accept them only if you initiated these.
loginFailedDescription: Possibly your account is not activated in this organization.
loginUseUsernamePassword: Sign in with username and password
maxHoursBeforeDelete: Max. hours to cancel a booking before its start time
mergeUserAccountsHint: You can easily merge this Seatsurfing user account for your Confluence user with your regular Seatsurfing user account. This enables you to use both the mobile app and the Confluence integration to manage your bookings. Enter the email address of your regular Seatsurfing account to get started.
mergeUserAccountsNextStepHint: Great! One step left: Log in with your regular Seatsurfing user account using the web app to confirm this merge request within the next hour.
name: Name
noAdminRestrictions: Don't restrict admins (bookings per user, duration, in advance)
noAreasFounds: No areas found. Please try to adjust your filters.
orgSignupFailed: That didn't work as expected! Maybe your registration has timed out.
orgSignupSuccess: You're ready to go! Your Seatsurfing organization has been set up.
recurrenceAvailabilityError: {{numErr}} of {{numTotal}} occurrences are not available for the selected recurrence.
saveAreaToGetLink: Save area to get a valid link
setAllowBookersHint: Leave empty if booking is not limited.
setApproversHint: Leave empty if no approval is required.
subject: Subject
updateAvailable: Please update Seatsurfing to the latest version {{version}}.
verifyDomainHowto: To verify domain {{domain}}, please add the following TXT record to your DNS server:
verifyEmailHint: Please enter the verification code that has been sent to your new email address in order to persist the changed email address.
spaceBookedInfo: This space is already booked and not available in the selected date range.
spaceBookedInfoMyBooking: You already booked this space in the selected date range.
newUserDefaultMailNotification: Enable mail notification for new users by default
enforceTOTP: Enforce Two-Factor Authentication (TOTP) for all users
confirmDeleteOrgQuestion2: Are you REALLY sure? If you delete this organization, all bookings, areas, spaces and users will be deleted irretrievably. No recovery will be possible.
userInvited: User has been invited. They will receive an email to set their password.
welcomeSetPassword: Welcome! Please set your password to get started.
inviteLinkExpired: This invitation link has expired or has already been used.
disableTotpConfirm: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication? This will make your account less secure.
enableTotpHint: To enable two-factor authentication, please scan the QR code with your authenticator app and enter the generated 6-digit code to confirm.
enterTotpCode: Please enter the 6-digit code generated by your authenticator app.
noQrCodeTotpHint: If you cannot scan the QR code, you can also enter the following secret key in your authenticator app:
totpHint: Two-factor authentication adds an additional layer of security to your account. Once enabled, you'll need to provide a 6-digit code from your authenticator app in addition to your password when logging in.
cantScanQrCode: Can't scan QR code? Click to show secret key
totpSecretWarning: Keep this secret key secure! Anyone with access to it can generate codes for your account. Only enter it into your authenticator app.
totpEnforcementMessage: Your administrator has enforced two-factor authentication for all users. You need to set up two-factor authentication to continue using your account.
passkeysHint: Passkeys allow you to sign in securely without a password using your device biometrics or security key.
passkeyNamePlaceholder: Passkey name, e.g. MacBook Face ID
passkeyNameRequired: Please enter a name for this passkey.
passkeyRegisterError: Failed to register passkey. Please try again.
passkeyDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this passkey?
passkeyDeleteError: Failed to delete passkey. Please try again.
passkeyRequired: Please verify your identity using your passkey.
